summary: Core Valentine single-page UI appears to be implemented (hero with “Ahana”, romantic styling, floating-hearts animation with reduced-motion handling, and use of required image paths), but the required static image assets themselves are not present in the diff. Additionally, Internet Identity/auth-related hooks and provider wiring were added despite being a non-goal and also touching paths marked immutable by the BuildRequest constraints.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add required static image assets to the project under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them on the page from there (no backend image serving).
missing_requirements.reason: The page references the required generated asset filenames, but the diff does not include any added files under frontend/public/assets/generated, so the assets are not actually added by this change set.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication provider/hook integration and actor creation logic (auth-related infrastructure) was added.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists Internet Identity login / any third-party authentication as a non-goal, and also lists these hook files and main.tsx as immutable (do not edit). The diff adds/changes functionality in these exact areas and wires the app to InternetIdentityProvider.
